## üéØ Key Features Documentation

### Repository Health Management
- **Health Scoring System** - Weighted scoring across 4 categories (Documentation 25%, Security 30%, Branch Protection 20%, CI/CD 25%)
- **Compliance Automation** - Full compliance checking with auto-fix capabilities
- **Local Auditing** - Comprehensive local file analysis without GitHub API dependency

### Security Management
- **Security Audits** - Local npm audit integration and file permission analysis
- **Security Policies** - Automated security policy generation
- **Vulnerability Detection** - Comprehensive vulnerability scanning

### Documentation Standards
- **Documentation Analysis** - Quality assessment and validation
- **Auto-generation** - Missing documentation creation
- **Compliance Checking** - Essential files verification

### CI/CD Pipeline Management
- **Workflow Analysis** - GitHub Actions workflow validation
- **Template Generation** - Common patterns and best practices
- **Performance Optimization** - Recommendations for workflow improvements

### AI Agent Mode
- **Zero-configuration Automation** - Automatic token detection and environment setup
- **Local-only Mode** - Works without GitHub API access
- **Auto-fix Capabilities** - Automated compliance fixes

### Cross-Repository Automation
- **Organization Health Monitoring** - Daily automated audits
- **Workflow Detection** - Missing CI/CD workflow identification
- **Dependency Tracking** - Version coordination across repositories

## üîå MCP Server

The Repository Metadata Manager includes a **Model Context Protocol (MCP) server** for AI assistants:

- **13 Repository Management Tools** - Available in GitHub Copilot, Claude, and other AI assistants
- **Natural Language Interface** - Use plain English to interact with repository tools
- **Organization-wide Operations** - Manage multiple repositories seamlessly
- **[MCP Server Documentation](../mcp-server/README.md)** - Complete setup and usage guide

## üìã CLI Commands

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `health` | Calculate overall repository health score (0-100) |
| `security` | Security audit and vulnerability detection |
| `branches` | Branch protection analysis and enforcement |
| `docs` | Documentation quality assessment and generation |
| `cicd` | CI/CD workflow analysis and template generation |
| `compliance` | Full compliance check with auto-fix capabilities |
| `ai-agent` | AI agent mode with automatic token detection |
| `automation` | Cross-repository operations and org-wide automation |
| `interactive` | Interactive wizard for guided repository management |
| `analytics` | Organization-wide analytics and insights |
| `template` | Generate new projects from templates |

## üè¢ Organization Standards

This tool enforces Alteriom organization standards for:

- **Repository Structure** - Standardized file organization
- **Documentation Requirements** - Essential documentation files
- **Security Policies** - Organization-wide security standards
- **CI/CD Workflows** - Standardized automation pipelines
- **Branch Protection** - Consistent protection rules
- **Dependency Management** - Version coordination
